DOC.brief_summary: Study investigate pharmacokinetics single i.v . dose tiotropium ( 4.8 mcg ) patient renal impairment comparison healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: The Pharmacokinetic , Safety Tolerability Tiotropium Outpatients With Renal Impairment Comparison Healthy Subjects
